name: Churches And Trade In Munich
description:
How did the Catholic religion and international trade influence the fate of Munich, which is also called “the German Rome”, from the 12th century until today?

This tour deals with two topics which have influenced the world almost equally for thousands of years. The believe in god(s) and the consumation and trade of products. Of course Munich was shaped by these „forces“ too. And even more than that. Munich wouldn´t exist if it wasn´t for trade and would have a different name if it wasn´t for religion.
